casebody.data:
Monday, August 3, 1998

MOTION DOCKET

96-2350. Smith v. Granville Twp. Bd. of Trustees.

Licking App. No. 96CA98. This cause came on for further consideration upon appellees’ motion for stay pending appeal to the Supreme Court of the United States. Upon consideration thereof, IT IS ORDERED by the court that the motion for stay be, and hereby is, denied.
